messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] games
messages.msgSnippet: ... Here s their web addy: http://www.setgame.com/ Nancy -- Children enter school as question marks and leave as periods. -Neil Postman, professor and author
messages.messageBody:
on 10/20/03 4:21 PM, M. Dalrymple-Lepore at si1verkitten@... wrote:

> Heh . . . The game Set has been mentioned a number of times, so I
> googled & ebayed for it . . . but of course "set" is such a common word
> . . .
>
> Can anyone give me a clue on maybe the maker of the game so that i can
> narrow the search?
>

Here's their web addy:

http://www.setgame.com/



Nancy


--
Children enter school as question marks and leave as periods.
-Neil Postman, professor and author (1931- )

messages.subject: games
messages.msgSnippet: Heh . . .  The game Set has been mentioned a number of times, so I googled & ebayed for it . . . but of course set is such a common word . . . Can anyone
messages.messageBody:
Heh . . . The game Set has been mentioned a number of times, so I
googled & ebayed for it . . . but of course "set" is such a common word
. . .

Can anyone give me a clue on maybe the maker of the game so that i can
narrow the search?

Thanks!

(And thank you so much for all your advice about the Scrabble!! I am
feeling much more confident about how I want to play games with him . .
.)

Melanie in PA
